nodes.text: Norge was a cargo freighter that approached Azzameen Station shortly after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY.
The cargo freighter pulled three Class-I cargo containers, two Class-J cargo containers, and four Class-D cargo containers, as well as a rear engine block.

Shortly after the Battle of Hoth, a pivotal battle between Galactic Empire and Alliance to Restore the Republic forces in 3 ABY, the Norge exited hyperspace near Azzameen Station as Ace Azzameen and Aeron Azzameen made a delivery to the XQ1 Platform Harlequin Station on Ace's first transport run.
